page.title: 02ECOLOGY : CANNICH AREA
page.content:
Because of the sheltered position of the village of Cannich the{climate}can range from being very mild in summer with severe weather often with extremely heavy snowfalls and hard frosts in winter. Thick mist often lies over the area around the River Glass which runs through the Strath.
The{land type }in the surrounding area is mainly either woodland or rocky hills interspersed with peat bogs.
{Pollution}is virtually non-existent. There are no factories or quarries, nor is there any substantial traffic { in the area, the smoke from household fires being the only sign of pollution although most homes use electricity as a means of heating.
